list_editor.description: The text editor used for opening the text file

path_to_file.description: The path to the text file. It must already exist.

empty_file_message.description: The message shown when the text file is empty

prefix_string.description: The text added to the beginning of every panel message

suffix_string.description: The text added to the end of every panel message

text_width.description: The width of the panel text in characters

reminder_delay.description: How often (in seconds) to flash the applet periodically for reminders. Set to 0 to disable

reminder_time.description: How long (in milliseconds) should the applet reminder color stay set. Set to 0 for infinity
